nodes.text: The X-37 Oppressor Droid was a battle droid that served among the Sith Empire's forces on the Maelstrom Prison. It was destroyed by Republic forces that raided the space station early in the Galactic War.
The X-37 Oppressor Droid appears as the first boss in the Flashpoint "Maelstrom Prison" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released by BioWare in 2011.
